title: Exploring Mathematical Concepts Through VR-Based Collaborative Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic geometry concepts understanding and foundational online learning tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Applied as a VR technology-based math pedagogy practice course within a pre-service teacher education program for elementary students

learning_goals: Improve spatial reasoning ability by 20% through collaborative problem-solving in VR environments
Learners can explain the synthesis and decomposition of geometric shapes with 80% accuracy using simulation tools.
Through a peer feedback system, learners achieve at least an intermediate level in mathematical communication skills based on a 3-tier evaluation criteria.

resources: VR Headset or Mobile VR Device

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
